greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Tree generated by the Beatty sequence of sqrt(3).
comment: A permutation of the positive integers.
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: Let r=sqrt(3) and s=r/(r-1). The tree-array T(n,k) is then
mathematica: a = {1, 2}; row = {a[[-1]]}; r = Sqrt[3]; s = r/(r - 1); Do[a = Join[a, row = Flatten[{Floor[#*{r, s}]} & /@ row]], {n, 5}]; a (* _Ivan Neretin_, Nov 09 2015 *)
xref: Cf. A022838 (Beatty sequence of sqrt(3)), A054406, A074049.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 23 2010
